nodes.text: Rick Famuyiwa (born June 18, 1973) is an American film director, producer and screenwriter best known for the 2015 film Dope. He directed two episodes of the live-action Star Wars television series The Mandalorian, created by director Jon Favreau. It was reported and confirmed by Famuyiwa's representatives on August 21, 2019 that Famuyiwa will direct an undisclosed number of episodes for the second season of The Mandalorian.
